First
Initial consultation
Navigating the process of moving abroad can be overwhelming, but with TEFL Service, it becomes a smooth and streamlined experience. You have access to our consultants who have personal experience with teaching abroad. Our process is designed to guide you every step of the way, ensuring you have the necessary tools and support to succeed.

In our meeting, we will be upfront about what to expect, the challenges to overcome and we are fully committed to helping you make the right decision. We do not proceed with clients after this stage unless we foresee a highly likely chance that we can place you in one of our partner schools.
Second
TEFL/TESOL Course
Following on from the consultation, we will help you choose the best course for teaching. We will also provide you with all the necessary support to ensure your success. You must have TEFL/TESOL certificate and a degree to work legally in most countries.
THIRD
Preparation
After completing your TEFL/TESOL certificate, we help you prepare your move abroad by giving you a checklist of the documents you will need so that you do not waste precious time and money before moving.

At this stage, you will need to apply for a visa to work in the country you are moving to. We will help you prepare your application and guide you through the visa process.
FOURTH
Employment
We will help you find a job in the country you are moving to. We will also help you prepare for the interview and provide you with all the necessary support to ensure you get the job. We have current information on pay rates, work hours, and more from the major educational companies in Vietnam.

It can be very nerve-wracking to begin a teaching career, you are likely to feel lost and confused in the classroom. We provide 1-1 guidance for your first few lessons at your new school, including our in-house activities and worksheets.

Frequently asked questions

We are typically available for interviews during office hours (GMT + 7) Monday to Friday. Sign up below with your preferred time and contact details and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

Well.. there is none ! We will not ask you for any fees for our consultations.

Our Business model is based on matching your needs with the right business and resources. By building a network of trusted partners, we are rewarded when you are successful.

To work legally in any country, you need to have a visa, a work permit and a residence permit. We mainly focus on the Vietnamese market, and to work legally in Vietnam, you must have had a degree (in any subject) and you must be a native English speaker.

The paperwork and steps to process your legal documents and qualifications can be quite confusing, that's why we are here to help you !

  • Requirements
  • Process

We pride ourselves in giving comprehensive support to our clients from the beginning of the process (before the interview) to the end of the process (after the interview) and everything in between.

In our initial consultation, we will help you decide which TEFL course to take (unless you have one already), discuss which company would be fit your schedule, and help you get your visa and work permit.

Not only that, once you begin teaching, we can continue to give you individual support with our high quality teaching materials.
